meanings.definition: A detailed plan or outline of a building or structure.
meanings.sent1: The architect showed us the blueprint of the new house.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers followed the blueprint to build the skyscraper.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the blueprint, creating a unique design.
meanings.sent4: Her vision for the project was like a blueprint, carefully outlining every detail.
meanings.sent5: The blueprint of the bridge made it easy to understand how it would be constructed.

meanings.definition: A photographic print of a detailed drawing or design.
meanings.sent1: The artist proudly displayed the blueprint of her latest artwork.
meanings.sent2: The engineer used the blueprint to recreate the intricate design.
meanings.sent3: The blueprint of the painting was so clear, it looked almost real.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a blueprint of creativity, capturing every detail effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The blueprint of the map helped navigate through the intricate maze.
